    • Method Detail

      • createUnit

        public static Unit createUnit​(String unitType,
                              HexMap map,
                              Hex hex,
                              Direction facing)
        Create a new unit from the given type string with the given ID.
        The ID of the new unit will be assigned, starting at 'A' and incrementing with every new unit.
        Types of units:
        • Scorpion Light Tank (BV = 306)
        • Bulldog Medium Tank (BV = 605)
        • Manticore Heavy Tank (BV = 993)
        • Jenner JR7-D (BV = 875)
        • Hunchback HBK-4G (BV = 1041)
        • Catapult CPLT-C1 (BV = 1399)
        • Atlas AS7-D (BV = 1897)
        Parameters:
        unitType - type of unit to create
        map - the map to place the unit on
        hex - location of the unit
        facing - direction the unit will face
        Returns:
        the new unit
